content.question: Which of the following descriptions of juvenile salmon activity is best supported by the data in Figure 2 ?

choices.label: Daytime activity increases when only a predator is present.
Nighttime activity decreases when only a competitor is present.
Daytime activity increases when only a competitor is present.
Nighttime activity increases in the presence of competitors and predators.

content.answer: Daytime activity increases when only a competitor is present.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
